servinfo.title: DTC P1621: Immobilizer Communication Line Error

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Immobilizer Control System Wiring Circuit Diagram

entry.ptxt: Communication error between immobilizer control module (ICM) and ECM is detected by ECM.

item.ptxt: Poor connection at immobilizer control module (ICM) connector
Open in power supply wire circuit
Short to ground wire circuit in communication wire circuits
Short to power supply wire circuit in communication wire circuits

test1.ptxt: Clear DTC(s) referring to Diagnostic Trouble Code (DTC) Clearance .
Turn the ignition switch to OFF position.
Check if any DTC is detected referring to Diagnostic Trouble Code (DTC) Check .
Check if any related fuse is blown.

action.ptxt: Replace blown fuse(s) with new one(s).

testgroup.title: Immobilizer control module (ICM) poor connection check

test1.ptxt: Disconnect immobilizer control module (ICM) connector “G24” referring to Immobilizer Control Module (ICM) Removal and Installation .
Check if wire connections are normal at immobilizer control module (ICM) connector “G24”.

testgroup.question: Is each wire connection normal?

test1.ptxt: Disconnect ECM connector “E23” referring to Engine Control Module (ECM) Removal and Installation .
Check if wire connections at “E23-13” and “E23-28” wire terminals are normal.

testgroup.title: Check for open in power supply wire circuit

test1.ptxt: Connect immobilizer control module (ICM) connector “G24” referring to Immobilizer Control Module (ICM) Removal and Installation .
With the ignition switch at ON position, check voltage between “G24-1” wire terminal at immobilizer control module (ICM) and body ground.

testgroup.question: Is voltage about 12 V?

action.ptxt: Repair open in power supply wire circuit.

testgroup.title: Check for open in ground wire circuit

test1.ptxt: With the ignition switch at ON position, check voltage between “G24-2” wire terminal at immobilizer control module (ICM) and body ground.

testgroup.question: Is voltage 0?

action.ptxt: Repair open in ground wire circuit.

testgroup.title: Check for open in communication wire circuit

test1.ptxt: Disconnect immobilizer control module (ICM) connector “G24” referring to Immobilizer Control Module (ICM) Removal and Installation .
Disconnect ECM connector “E23” referring to Engine Control Module (ECM) Removal and Installation .
Check resistance between “G24-3” wire terminal at immobilizer control module (ICM) connector and “E23-28” wire terminal at ECM connector.

testgroup.question: Is resistance infinite?

action.ptxt: Repair open in communication wire circuit.

testgroup.title: Check for short to ground circuit in communication wire circuit

test1.ptxt: With immobilizer control module (ICM) connector “G24” and ECM connector “E23” disconnected, check resistance between “G24-3” wire terminal at immobilizer control module (ICM) connector and body ground.

testgroup.question: Is resistance infinite?

action.ptxt: Repair short to ground wire circuit in communication wire circuit.

testgroup.title: Check for short to power circuit in communication wire circuit

test1.ptxt: With immobilizer control module (ICM) connector “G24” and ECM connector “E23” disconnected, turn the ignition switch to ON position.
Check voltage between “G24-3” wire terminal at immobilizer control module (ICM) connector and body ground.

testgroup.question: Is voltage 0 V?

action.ptxt: Repair short to power supply wire circuit in communication wire circuit.

testgroup.title: Check for open in communication wire circuit

test1.ptxt: With immobilizer control module (ICM) connector “G24” and ECM connector “E23” disconnected, check resistance between “G24-4” wire terminal at immobilizer control module (ICM) connector and “E23-13” wire terminal at ECM connector.

testgroup.question: Is resistance infinite?

action.ptxt: Repair open in communication wire circuit.

testgroup.title: Check for short to ground wire circuit in communication wire circuit

test1.ptxt: With immobilizer control module (ICM) connector “G24” and ECM connector “E23” disconnected, check resistance between “G24-4” wire terminal at immobilizer control module (ICM) connector and body ground.

testgroup.question: Is resistance infinite?

action.ptxt: Repair short to ground wire circuit in communication wire circuit.

testgroup.title: Check for short to power circuit in communication wire circuit

test1.ptxt: With immobilizer control module (ICM) connector “G24” and ECM connector “E23” disconnected, turn the ignition switch to ON position.
Check voltage between “G24-4” wire terminal at immobilizer control module (ICM) connector and body ground.

testgroup.question: Is voltage 0 V?

action.ptxt: Repair short to power supply wire circuit in communication wire circuit.

testgroup.title: Check for short of communication wire circuit

test1.ptxt: With immobilizer control module (ICM) connector “G24” and ECM connector “E23” disconnected, check resistance between “G24-3” wire terminal and “G24-4” wire terminal at immobilizer control module (ICM) connector.

testgroup.question: Is resistance infinite?

action.ptxt: Repair short of communication wire circuits.

test1.ptxt: Check immobilizer control module (ICM) referring to Inspection of Immobilizer Control Module (ICM) and Its Circuit .

action.ptxt: Replace ECM with new one referring to Engine Control Module (ECM) Removal and Installation , and then perform Procedure after ECM Replacement .
Replace immobilizer control module (ICM) with new one referring to Immobilizer Control Module (ICM) Removal and Installation .
